titles.title: CB 69 Thy Lovingkindness is Better Than Life

properties.copyright: Â©1956 New Spring (Brentwood-Benson Music Publishing Company)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
THY LOVINGKINDNESS IS BETTER THAN
LIFE,
Thy lovingkindness is better than life.
My lips shall praise Thee,
Thus will I bless Thee;
I will lift up my hands in Thy name.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I lift my hands up unto Thy name.
I lift my hands up unto Thy name.
My lips shall praise Thee,
Thus will I bless Thee;
I will lift up my hands in Thy name.
